title: The Lens (Clona) S01 - Webstream - Hardcoded Eng Subs - Sno
description:
The Lens (Clona) S01 - Webstream - Hardcoded Eng Subs - Sno

This is from an SD Webstream. There may be occasional streaming errors - I've done what I can with this - hope you enjoy it . . . 

I upload to TPB + KAT. If Scene sites take my ups give me credit and keep the file names the same - Thanx

Crime thriller from the Czech Republic - a traffic photographer is recruited into an elite crime squad after his images help solve the murder of his own father . . .


Episode 1: Death of a Cop
Police traffic photographer Roman is devastated when his father is killed in a hit-and-run accident, but could his video recording help the Criminal Investigation Department identify the culprits?

Episode 2: Trial by Fire
Having joined the elite crime squad, Roman must complete his training and, while video-recording a wedding ceremony for his mother, he finds a surprising clue to the identity of a gang of bank robbers

Episode 3: Kidnapping
When Roman's former girlfriend Lenka is reported missing, he goes out searching for her alone and discovers that, as part of her studies, she had been working on a film about an ex-convict

Episode 4: Hell or High Water
The team are under pressure to track down the murderer of a woman whose limbs have been found in the Vltava river. All circumstantial evidence points to her husband, but does he have a motive?

Episode 5: Snitch
To track down the murderer of a former workmate, Roman's colleague Tomas infiltrates a gang of drug dealers, but during the police round-up operation, the leader of the criminals manages to escape

Episode 6: The Hitchhiker
Barta sends Roman, Borek and Nikola to investigate the shocking murders of a number of hitchhikers, but the perpetrator is devious and manages to evade the police, so Nikola decides to lay a trap

Episode 7: Cameraman
Dangerous criminal Dyml is on the scene again, but somebody is using a mobile phone to record the crimes committed by his drug dealing gang and sending the footage to Barta's police team

Video 852 x 480 / 25 fps / 1000 (approx) kbps / MP4

Audio 128 kbps AAC

Duration 0:52 (approx)
